an10.198:1.1: “I will teach you the principle to realize and the principle not to realize. …
an10.198:1.3: And what is the principle not to realize?
an10.198:1.6: This is called the principle not to realize.
an10.198:2.1: And what is the principle to realize?
an10.198:2.4: This is called the principle to realize.”
